markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fade Away](/Feats.aspx?ID=1020) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Halfling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=87" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 45 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Easily Dismissed](/Feats.aspx?ID=1016)

</column>

---

Your ability to blend into the background allows you to fade away entirely or appear innocuous even to magical effects. You gain [_invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) and [_misdirection_](/Spells.aspx?ID=198) as 2nd-level innate occult spells. You can target only yourself with _invisibility_, and you must be the primary target of _misdirection_. You can cast each spell once per day.
name: Fade Away
